00115 template<typename ValueType>
00116 class PointAttributeVector {
00117 public:
00118     typedef ValueType value_type;
00119 
00120     PointAttributeVector(const std::vector<value_type>& data)
00121         : mData(data) { }
00122 
00123     size_t size() const { return mData.size(); }
00124     void getPos(size_t n, ValueType& xyz) const { xyz = mData[n]; }
00125 
00126     template <typename T>
00127     void get(size_t n, T& value) const { value = mData[n]; }
00128 
00129 private:
00130     const std::vector<value_type>& mData;
00131 }; // PointAttributeVector

00137 namespace point_conversion_internal {

00139 template<typename PointDataTreeType, typename PointIndexTreeType>
00140 struct InitialiseAttributesOp {
00141 
00142     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTreeType> LeafManagerT;
00143     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange LeafRangeT;
00144 
00145     typedef typename PointIndexTreeType::LeafNodeType PointIndexLeafNode;
00146     typedef typename PointIndexLeafNode::IndexArray IndexArray;
00147 
00148     InitialiseAttributesOp( PointDataTreeType& tree,
00149                             const PointIndexTreeType& pointIndexTree,
00150                             const AttributeSet::Descriptor::Ptr& attributeDescriptor)
00151         : mTree(tree)
00152         , mPointIndexTree(pointIndexTree)
00153         , mAttributeDescriptor(attributeDescriptor) { }
00154 
00155     void operator()(const typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange& range) const {
00156         for (typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange::Iterator leaf=range.begin(); leaf; ++leaf) {
00157 
00158             // obtain the PointIndexLeafNode (using the origin of the current leaf)
00159 
00160             const PointIndexLeafNode* pointIndexLeaf = mPointIndexTree.probeConstLeaf(leaf->origin());
00161 
00162             if (!pointIndexLeaf)    continue;
00163 
00164             // initialise the attribute storage
00165 
00166             pointIndexLeaf->indices();
00167 
00168             const IndexArray& indices = pointIndexLeaf->indices();
00169 
00170             Index64 pointCount = indices.size();
00171 
00172             leaf->initializeAttributes(mAttributeDescriptor, pointCount);
00173         }
00174     }
00175 
00177 
00178     const PointDataTreeType&                mTree;
00179     const PointIndexTreeType&               mPointIndexTree;
00180     const AttributeSet::Descriptor::Ptr&    mAttributeDescriptor;
00181 };
00182 
00183 template<   typename PointDataTreeType,
00184             typename PointIndexTreeType,
00185             typename PositionListType>
00186 struct PopulatePositionAttributeOp {
00187 
00188     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTreeType> LeafManagerT;
00189     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange LeafRangeT;
00190 
00191     typedef typename PointIndexTreeType::LeafNodeType PointIndexLeafNode;
00192     typedef typename PointIndexLeafNode::IndexArray IndexArray;
00193 
00194     typedef typename PositionListType::value_type ValueType;
00195 
00196     PopulatePositionAttributeOp(const PointIndexTreeType& pointIndexTree,
00197                                 const math::Transform& transform,
00198                                 const PositionListType& positions)
00199         : mPointIndexTree(pointIndexTree)
00200         , mTransform(transform)
00201         , mPositions(positions) { }
00202 
00203     void operator()(const typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange& range) const {
00204 
00205         for (typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange::Iterator leaf=range.begin(); leaf; ++leaf) {
00206 
00207             // obtain the PointIndexLeafNode (using the origin of the current leaf)
00208 
00209             const PointIndexLeafNode* pointIndexLeaf = mPointIndexTree.probeConstLeaf(leaf->origin());
00210 
00211             if (!pointIndexLeaf)    continue;
00212 
00213             typename AttributeWriteHandle<ValueType>::Ptr attributeWriteHandle =
00214                 leaf->template attributeWriteHandle<ValueType>("P");
00215 
00216             Index64 index = 0;
00217 
00218             const IndexArray& indices = pointIndexLeaf->indices();
00219 
00220             for (typename IndexArray::const_iterator it = indices.begin(), it_end = indices.end(); it != it_end; ++it)
00221             {
00222                 ValueType positionWorldSpace;
00223                 mPositions.getPos(*it, positionWorldSpace);
00224 
00225                 const ValueType positionIndexSpace = mTransform.worldToIndex(positionWorldSpace);
00226 
00227                 const ValueType positionVoxelSpace = ValueType(
00228                             positionIndexSpace.x() - math::Round(positionIndexSpace.x()),
00229                             positionIndexSpace.y() - math::Round(positionIndexSpace.y()),
00230                             positionIndexSpace.z() - math::Round(positionIndexSpace.z()));
00231 
00232                 attributeWriteHandle->set(index, positionVoxelSpace);
00233 
00234                 index++;
00235             }
00236         }
00237     }
00238 
00240 
00241     const PointIndexTreeType&   mPointIndexTree;
00242     const math::Transform&      mTransform;
00243     const PositionListType&     mPositions;
00244 };
00245 
00246 template<   typename PointDataTreeType,
00247             typename PointIndexTreeType,
00248             typename AttributeListType>
00249 struct PopulateAttributeOp {
00250 
00251     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTreeType> LeafManagerT;
00252     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange LeafRangeT;
00253 
00254     typedef typename PointIndexTreeType::LeafNodeType PointIndexLeafNode;
00255     typedef typename PointIndexLeafNode::IndexArray IndexArray;
00256 
00257     typedef typename AttributeListType::value_type ValueType;
00258 
00259     PopulateAttributeOp(const PointIndexTreeType& pointIndexTree,
00260                         const AttributeListType& data,
00261                         const openvdb::Name& attributeName)
00262         : mPointIndexTree(pointIndexTree)
00263         , mData(data)
00264         , mAttributeName(attributeName) { }
00265 
00266     void operator()(const typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange& range) const {
00267 
00268         for (typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange::Iterator leaf=range.begin(); leaf; ++leaf) {
00269 
00270             // obtain the PointIndexLeafNode (using the origin of the current leaf)
00271 
00272             const PointIndexLeafNode* pointIndexLeaf = mPointIndexTree.probeConstLeaf(leaf->origin());
00273 
00274             if (!pointIndexLeaf)    continue;
00275 
00276             typename AttributeWriteHandle<ValueType>::Ptr attributeWriteHandle =
00277                 leaf->template attributeWriteHandle<ValueType>(mAttributeName);
00278 
00279             Index64 index = 0;
00280 
00281             const IndexArray& indices = pointIndexLeaf->indices();
00282 
00283             for (typename IndexArray::const_iterator it = indices.begin(), it_end = indices.end(); it != it_end; ++it)
00284             {
00285                 ValueType value;
00286                 mData.template get<ValueType>(*it, value);
00287 
00288                 attributeWriteHandle->set(index, value);
00289 
00290                 index++;
00291             }
00292         }
00293     }
00294 
00296 
00297     const PointIndexTreeType&   mPointIndexTree;
00298     const AttributeListType&    mData;
00299     const openvdb::Name&        mAttributeName;
00300 };
00301 
00302 } // namespace point_conversion_internal

00307 
00308 template<typename PointDataGridT, typename PositionArrayT, typename PointIndexGridT>
00309 inline typename PointDataGridT::Ptr
00310 createPointDataGrid(const PointIndexGridT& pointIndexGrid, const PositionArrayT& positions,
00311                     const openvdb::NamePair& positionType, const math::Transform& xform)
00312 {
00313     typedef typename PointDataGridT::TreeType                       PointDataTreeT;
00314     typedef typename PointIndexGridT::TreeType                      PointIndexTreeT;
00315     typedef typename tree::template LeafManager<PointDataTreeT>     LeafManagerT;
00316     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange                        LeafRangeT;
00317 
00318     using point_conversion_internal::InitialiseAttributesOp;
00319     using point_conversion_internal::PopulatePositionAttributeOp;
00320 
00321     // construct the Tree using a topology copy of the PointIndexGrid
00322 
00323     const PointIndexTreeT& pointIndexTree(pointIndexGrid.tree());
00324     typename PointDataTreeT::Ptr treePtr(new PointDataTreeT(pointIndexTree));
00325 
00326     LeafManagerT leafManager = LeafManagerT(*treePtr);
00327     LeafRangeT leafRange = leafManager.leafRange();
00328 
00329     // create attribute descriptor from position type
00330 
00331     AttributeSet::Descriptor::Ptr descriptor = AttributeSet::Descriptor::create(positionType);
00332 
00333     // create point attribute storage on each leaf
00334 
00335     InitialiseAttributesOp<PointDataTreeT, PointIndexTreeT> initialise(
00336                                 *treePtr, pointIndexGrid.tree(), descriptor);
00337     tbb::parallel_for(leafRange, initialise);
00338 
00339     // populate position attribute
00340 
00341     PopulatePositionAttributeOp<PointDataTreeT,
00342                                 PointIndexTreeT,
00343                                 PositionArrayT> populate(pointIndexTree,
00344                                                         xform,
00345                                                         positions);
00346 
00347     tbb::parallel_for(leafRange, populate);
00348 
00349     typename PointDataGridT::Ptr grid = PointDataGridT::create(treePtr);
00350     grid->setTransform(xform.copy());
00351     return grid;
00352 }
00353

00357 
00358 template <typename PointDataGridT, typename ValueT>
00359 inline typename PointDataGridT::Ptr
00360 createPointDataGrid(const std::vector<ValueT>& positions,
00361                     const openvdb::NamePair& positionType,
00362                     const math::Transform& xform)
00363 {
00364     const PointAttributeVector<ValueT> pointList(positions);
00365 
00366     PointIndexGrid::Ptr pointIndexGrid = createPointIndexGrid<PointIndexGrid>(pointList, xform);
00367     return createPointDataGrid<PointDataGridT>(*pointIndexGrid, pointList, positionType, xform);
00368 }

00373 
00374 template <typename PointDataTreeT, typename PointIndexTreeT, typename PointArrayT>
00375 inline void
00376 populateAttribute(  PointDataTreeT& tree, const PointIndexTreeT& pointIndexTree,
00377                     const openvdb::Name& attributeName, const PointArrayT& data)
00378 {
00379     using point_conversion_internal::PopulateAttributeOp;
00380 
00381     // populate attribute
00382 
00383     PopulateAttributeOp<PointDataTreeT,
00384                         PointIndexTreeT,
00385                         PointArrayT> populate(pointIndexTree, data, attributeName);
00386 
00387     tbb::parallel_for(typename tree::template LeafManager<PointDataTree>(tree).leafRange(), populate);
00388 }
